alert.note: Alert for Allamakee; Clayton; Fayette (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 10 at 4:22PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Clayton, east central Fayette and south central Allamakee Counties through 445 PM CDT... At 421 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Farmersburg, or 8 miles northwest of Elkader, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Farmersburg around 430 PM CDT. Monona around 435 PM CDT. McGregor around 445 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Froelich, Volney, Spook Cave Campground, Brainard, Giard, Watson, County Roads B 56 And X 16, St. Olaf, Luana and National. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
